website_summaries.verdict: A unique skate that's fast and tall and will help you cover the distances.
pros: Hard exterior for more protection of your foot
Wheels are replaceable and can be removed
cons: There is no brake on these skates and no way to add one

customer_reviews.title: Um. I love Them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a short man, only 5'4", these almost make me normal height when they're on. So hECK YEA TO THAT. They took a little getting used to because I've only ever been on small wheels and it's been a few years since even that, but they go over sidewalk cracks and small debris really smooth and that's exactly what I wanted out of them! AND they're shiny, which pleases my simple lizard brain. Fit is alright if you size up but the lining isn't the most comfortable. I got a nasty rub burn over my right ankle and will be using sport wrap to cut down on the friction until I can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Em

customer_reviews.title: The WHEELS are replaceable!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Also, the 125mm wheels are replaceable! The skates come with an allen key so you can replace wheel if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great balance and feel for such huge wheels
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these. I wear size 10 shoes and the size 10 fit great. All of my friends love the size and looks too. I also like the hard shell vs a soft they give me a secure feeling.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have 2 German Shepherds who love to run. I leash them up and go. I found I need to keep them a little loose or they hurt my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Robb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and fasssst! Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: You can really cruise on these, 20mph+! If you’re an avid blader or ice skater these are perfect for getting some long miles in, and really getting a great workout. I’ve done over 200 miles in them since purchasing, and they still look brand new, wheels Themselves have a little wear, but not bad considering I have to T-stop a few times at intersections each time I take them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these with his birthday money and he loves them. He said they are very comfortable and easy to ride on.
customer_reviews.author: jimapuzzo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Skates EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love mine!! They are awesome and the glide over concrete and rocks and dirt. Still trying to get my power stop down, but other than that I love them! They are awesome if you have a dog that needs to run like I do. Your dog can pull you with ease and get some serious speed. So Much Fun!! Definitely worth every penny, also! They make you feel super tall!! It can be a little intimidating but you’ll get used to it. Get! Them! Man!
customer_reviews.author: HannahDrew

customer_reviews.title: Broke after half a mile
customer_reviews.text: The skates broke after half a mile when doing a slight turn. Very cheap quality. I strongly advise buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Love the higt ..
customer_reviews.text: I have it for 2 months now and love how fast u can go and the bike path or park ..just 6 miles each time I use it...I wish I can have it in deferent colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Styling and profiling!
customer_reviews.text: These are some badass looking skates. They work well as long as you are on a straight away. They are speed skates which means they are long. Not good for crossovers.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fast, easy to skate
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of skates in 15 years or more. I've taken them for a 4.5 mile spin, very comfortable, they go over bumps, crappy road surfaces very well. Fast, great around turns. Did not experience the rubbing but I also wear leggings while I'm using them. I'm having the time of my life during quarantine. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Adam Folkerts

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son and he totally loves them. "They were bigger than they look in the picture online, but they are... Amazing! Wonderful! Exciting! and they are really fast..." are some of his words.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: These skates go FAST!
customer_reviews.text: Not for beginner skaters. These skates go FAST! Great quality, very comfortable, look sharp. Again, they roll much faster than your average skate.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Fair

customer_reviews.title: Really cool skates. Totally different ride from normal sized 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool skates. Totally different ride from normal sized 4 wheels. I wear a 10 1/2- 11 shoe bought size 11 skates; perfect fit. Packaging was beat up and taped all over but skates are new and clean. Quick delivery no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these rollerblades! The boot is comfortable and can really take a hit. Highly recommend them for long distance and city skating.
customer_reviews.author: ItssZeuss

customer_reviews.title: Great... bur
customer_reviews.text: Great. Fun ride. Just the buckle on one side doesn’t want to close. I have to do the top buckle first before I can close the bottom one (ON 1 SIDE).
customer_reviews.author: Aleksei Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate.
customer_reviews.text: Skates fit great and are super fast so be ready. Probably for advance skaters. I'm hard to impress and loved these. Made with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Robbins

customer_reviews.title: You will break your neck!
customer_reviews.text: Roller blades ripped OUT OF THE SHOE BOTTOM. Do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and eye catching...so what if it has no breaks, this makes it even more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! I’m so happy!!!! Definitely 1000% recommend!!!! Everything is just perfect, i love it... Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anahel

customer_reviews.title: Freaking scam
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this is horrible!!! Would have put zero stars but it’s not possible
customer_reviews.author: james w maryland jr

customer_reviews.title: They a good.
customer_reviews.text: great skates except its a bit rough on the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and fast. the best for of street relief. The shipping was very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Is in perfect shape just I don want them the look cool in pic but the material is cheep
customer_reviews.author: Diosvany Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would be faster but they were not... still a great blade though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs brake option
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if it had a brake option
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works ok so far. Wheels do not turn equally, may be some quality control issues. It doesn't have brakes or an option to have one and no information on website regarding replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates because the review were really good and all.... but when I got it I’ve never been as disappointed as then!!!!!! The skates were really stiff..... tooo huge...... not comfortable..... they didn’t fit right like given in the review and I had to return it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rathi r.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels aren't replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are rivited, not replaceable. Quality is ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: john burt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the wheel frame and the supplier replaced the skates free of charge and fixed the issue with newer models. I love these skates and the service provided.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty comfy though
customer_reviews.text: Theses skates are alittle on the snug side . They are pretty comfy though . I haven't taken them farther the 5 miles on a single trip.I've had these bad boys a few months now and no problems at all. They are pretty fast especially after you replace the original bearings and they definitely roll over just about anything .For under 200 dollars I think this a good triskates I think it could do with a wheel/ bearing upgrade . All in all a great skate for what you would pay for some frames by themselves .also the wheels are not reveted THEY ARE REMOVABLE the Allen head is recessed I know because I have removed them often
customer_reviews.author: gregory collins

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor quality, Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Very bad, damaged in less than three months, what a quality!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Jaabari

product_meta.title: Epic Skates 125mm Engage 3-Wheel Inline Speed Skates
product_meta.description: The epic engage was designed for pure speed and agility, while offering a sense of fashion when cruising down the street, boardwalk, or local skating rink! The hard-shell design, paired with epic's one of a kind aircraft grade aluminum frame, offer a seamless combination of comfort and support, without sacrificing your need for speed.
feature_bullets: Boots - hard-shell upper combined with a pure-comfort liner
Wheels - 125mm high Rebound 86a with glass-filled plastic core wheels
Frame - 195mm mounted, aircraft grade, CNC, gold polished aluminum

specifications.Manufacturer: Josey Skateland, Inc DBA Epic Skates

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
